about_the_game:
Had enough of the city chaos? You escaped to a cozy village ready to relax and live a peaceful life, but there’s a twist. The town is buzzing with rumors about an elusive and mysterious giant fish that is causing quite a stir. No one can seem to reel it in. Are you brave enough to accept the challenge and indulge in the adventure of a lifetime? If you are, welcome to Fisherman’s Palace.




In Fisherman's Palace, fishing isn't just a pastime, it's the main event! The art of fishing is ingrained in the village's culture. With over 90 species of fish swimming in these waters, the challenge is on, to hook the best one! Cast your line, and become a master fisherman. It's not just a sport, it's a way of life. Get ready to tackle the waters and make a splash with your fishing skills!

  • COMPETITION


In Fisherman's Palace, the competition is as fierce as a shark’s bite! Folks here are locked in a competition, all gunning for that top spot on the leaderboard – the golden ticket to fame and fortune. Dive into the fishing frenzy during the season, aim for the biggest catch, and reel in the glory along with a hefty sum. So, gear up, cast your line, and let the fish games begin

  • FACTIONS


Pick a faction that suits your style! Each faction comes with its unique flair and personality, making the choice a tough but exciting one. Hang out with the locals from each group, soak in the distinct vibes, and get ready to make a splash by joining the faction that resonates with you the most. It's not just a choice it's an adventure into the diverse and lively community of the village. So, explore the various personalities and stories, and make a decision on what faction you will represent!




Beyond the thrill of fishing, you can test your skills in farming as well. Plant as much as you can to up your odds of reeling in the big fish. Cultivate crops that you can use as tempting bait or be sold for some sweet profit. So, sow those seeds, nurture your crops, and let the fields become your secret weapon in the pursuit of fishing glory!




Expand your horizons in Fisherman's Palace by building a bigger plot! It's not just about extra space, it means more room for your treasures, a workshop to craft top-notch bait, and the chance to grow the best farm in the village. Upgrade your fishing rods, unlock inventory space by upgrading your home, and transform your plot that puts all other farms to shame. In this village, it's not just about catching fish, it's about building your fisherman’s empire one upgrade at a time!

This game was made by a team of two (boyfriend and girlfriend), we worked hard and will continue to do so, if you have any suggestions contact us.

  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Fisherman’s Palace is an adventure game about a man who escaped the chaotic city life to start a new chapter in a relaxing village, BUT a mysterious fish has appeared. You must fish, compete in tournaments, craft new gear and build your farm to become the BEST in the whole village!
